title: Why are my emails being blocked to my wife's Rogers email
content: My emails (from bthomson@web.ca) to my wife (hstevens@rogers.com) are being blocked on her computer running Thunderbird. It happens whether I send them from Thunderbird myself or from Maildroid on my phone or tablet. All my other many many emails are getting through but not mine to her. I can't find a block instruction in her (or my) Thunderbird software which does this.
creator: bthomson

content: How do I replace deleted Thunderbird login information in the Saved Logins box in Passwords?

title: Why is my calendar muted and how can I unmute it? (flatpak)
content: I'm trying to use thunderbird with our companys gmail account (custom domain). I am able to get the calendar to show events, but for some reason, I can't get notifications from upcoming events. There is the slashed bell icon which says the calendar has been muted, but I have no idea why this is, or how to unmute it.
creator: mulderns

title: very slow
content: For a few days the program has been very slow, it takes a long time to open the emails, or to delete them for example. Is there a general problem or is it my problem?
creator: albert66
